title: Saving dead languages
description: How can dead languages be revived?

vocabItems.definition: person who is sent to a foreign country to teach their religion (often Christianity) to the people living there
person who belongs to no religion, or to a religion that is not Christianity, Judaism, or Islam
used to show the actual words spoken or written by someone else; used ironically to show scepticism, disagreement or belief that a word is misused

vocabItems.word: right the wrongs of the past
vocabItems.definition: take action to correct a historical injustice
